inclusion.criterion: Newly diagnosed sleep apnea (i.e. apnea/hypopnea index < 100 events per hour - average)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Diagnosed with prehypertension or Stage 1 hypertension as categorized by the American Heart Association
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Minimal alcohol consumption (i.e. no more than the equivalent of a glass of wine/day)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: A typical sleep/wake schedule (i.e. participants will not be night shift workers or have recently travelled across time zones)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: For spinal cord injured participants: incomplete spinal cord lesions at C3 or below and above T12 (greater than 36 mos. post-SCI) without joint contractures but with signs of voluntary ankle, knee and hip movements and the ability to ambulate at least one step without human assistance
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: 70 y/o with COPD on 2.5-3.5L O2 at baseline
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Any disease other than high blood pressure and sleep apnea
exclusion.label: triggers

exclusion.criterion: Medications for high blood pressure and sleep promoting supplements including melatonin
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has multiple comorbidities, but meets some inclusion criteria. Exclusion criterion of any disease other than high blood pressure and sleep apnea is a concern.
